reviewDetails.comment: Actually met with Juliya Roitman - very helpful, experienced - visit was short and got everything good for another year!
Dr. Manessis is wonderful. He takes his time with patients and makes sure you understand everything. Very friendly and knowledgeable.

Dr. Manessis Is an wonderful physician. He is direct and attentive. His is an excellent diagnostician. He does not subscribe medication unless Necessary and backs it up with Advice on healthy nutrition, exercise.  He has my highest recommendation.

He is a caring and kind doctor.  He takes the time to talk with me in a detailed way.  He is very open to answering questions and is a co-lead in my healthcare plan with me.  He is respectful and generous.  I have been seeing him for several years and he is among the best. doctors I have seen in NYC.  He is a good person and doctor.  He also hires capable and kind staff.
Excellent dr.  Very smart knowledgeable and very kind.  Listens, very thorough.  Really good dr.
Excellent Doctor!
Very helpful doctor and support staff.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Khan is very thorough, explains everything, and has a good bedside manner.  The staff is also friendly and competent.

His entire team was so kind and professional, and all of his equipment is state-of-the-art!  I was recommended to him by someone I trust and I am so grateful.  He is very thorough, too.  Great team all around!!!
Dr. Kahn is personable and an excellent Eye specialist.   I love him
Dr Kahn conducted a complete and thorough eye examination.  He answered all of my questions and I have recommend him to family and friends.

Absolutely recommend him. He has an extraordinarily  pleasant and with the most friendly of demeanors, that puts you at ease right away. Thorough and patient to explain what he is doing. You walk away smiling from a great office experience.

De khan is professional, knowledgeable, friendly and pays great attention detail. He treats you like an individual and not just like another number. His staff is also friendly and the office is comfortable and clean.
Dr. Kahn was friendly, thorough, and communicated very clearly during every part of my visit. I'd highly recommend this ophthalmologist.

reviewDetails.comment: I've been going to Dr. Bruce Chung for almost 10 years. He's excellent. I highly recommend him!
I recommend her to any family, she is an excellent doctor, she listen to her patients. i like that about her.
Dr. Chung has been my primary care provider for over 20 years.  He's awesome.  His office is super organized and well-run.  It's very easy to schedule timely appointments.
The office is very helpful and responsive to requests.  Dr. Chung and his staff are thorough in their work.

Dr. Chung is very responsive and attentive to my questions and gives me precise answers to my questions and open to discussing alternative options if they are available to me.  I have been going to Dr. Chung for years and in his new location, he has been able to offer more services to make it more convenient for me to see him for treatment and diagnosis.  Thanks.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Naysan had a great attitude, bedside manner and took the time to explain what he was doing and the treatment options for my eye infection.
He was very helpful and gave me some information on products that were helpful for my eye care.

He was very thorough. Very parties and kind. Took the time to explain everything and I really appreciated that my issue wasn’t in his wheelhouse and instead of coming up w a plan to correct he was honest and forthcoming that he wasn’t sure what the problem was and referred me to his colleague.

He was very thorough.   The visit was an "urgent " visit to assess an eye injury.   I went beyond assessing the injury and checked other things.  He also reviewed the chart from the previous optometrist and explained some of the comments and diagnosis that she had written.  I didn't feel rushed out of the office.
Very profession and good staff.
Very thorough and explains every detail to the patient.
Great doctor. Attentive and patient with my questions.
He and his staff were very thorough.

reviewDetails.comment: yes i just recommended someone who made an appointment with her.

Dr. Smerd is the kindest, most knowledgeable and most thorough doctor I have ever met. Her bedside manner is calm, compassionate and very caring. She is positive and that energy always shines through.

Dr. Smerd is very personable and has a calm presence and is a good listener.  She has good recall of past issues which is important in a GP for continuity and safety.  It is not difficult getting an appointment with her, and she replies to system messages quickly.
Dr. Smerd is fabulous. An excellent listener, pro-active recommendations, and careful examiner.
She was respectful and didn’t rush through our appointment. I felt like Dr Smerd really listened to me.

Dr. Rachel Smerd is an amazing doctor!!!! Personable, professional, approachable and responsive.  She has personally responded to my family's needs several times during the Covid pandemic. I highly recommend her!
She’s very patient and through.  She sits and takes the time to listen.  I love her!

reviewDetails.comment: Never introduced himself when he came in the office. Just asked why I was there. Not very warm or personable.
Doctor was through , informative and patient while examining me.
No sincere check up , no human care , no sincere care fir
Caring and thoughtful doctor! He is very personable and I definitely  recommend him!

Yes I would recommend Dr. Kirschner.   My visit I found to be informative, thorough and very pleasant. I left knowing more about what my next step is to be, but more important why it is being taken.   Isn’t that what you want from a Physician, plain talk and a good rationale.
Sincerely,
[PERSONAL INFO]
Very helpful! Knowledgeable! Accommodating! Clean office! Recommend 100%
Chip on his shoulder, most likely competent but don’t need to spend time with providers who interact this way.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Dilling is very knowledgeable, insightful, and personable. She asked a lot of questions and listened to the answers. It was my first appt with her. I felt comfortable right away.
yes, she is not just a great physitian but also a very nice and approchable person.
This was my first visit with Dr. Dilling for an annual wellness visit and she was kind and thorough in her questions about my health history and concerns.
Very attentive and thorough.
very nice.  very thorough.  doesn't talk down to me

schools.name: Columbia Univ Col Of Physicians & Surgeons-NY

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Keil is extremely thorough and attentive and spends as much time with me as she needs to. Never rushes. She provides great referrals for specialists. Her medical staff is skilled and pleasant. Dr Keil will call to provide aftercare results.

Dr Keil is an excellent primary care physician. She listens and is responsive when there are issues with health (of which I've had a few recently).  She is also so efficient at coordinating with other specialists to reach outcomes that holistically deal with my health.
Dr.Keil is truly exceptional, Her demeanor is calm and caring. She takes time to understand the issues of each patient. I wish more PCP were like Dr. Keil.
Takes care of business. Forthright.
She's a very pleasant person who makes you feel welcomed.  I was referred to her by my sister-in-law and am glad I waited the 2 months to get an appointment with her!

Dr. Kiel is very knowledgeable and accessible! She has been my primary care physician for almost two decades and I have nothing but positive things to say about her. She is an excellent listener and takes all of my concerns and questions very seriously, no matter how minor the issue. My husband is also under Dr.Keil’s care, I wanted him to switch over to her because I hold her in such high regard. Additionally, her office staff is very kind and accommodating, the environment is tidy and clean, phone calls are returned promptly and they typically run on time.

reviewDetails.comment: Very thorough examination, answers questions.

I found Dr. Stein to be kind, patient and thoughtful. I am usually somewhat anxious with doctors, but he immediately put me at ease. He answered all of my questions and followed up with me the following day to discuss test results. I wish that I had found him several years ago.
He is super intelligent, super compassionate, caring, smart as a ship, through. I would marry him but we’re both married to other people. He’s incredible. I recommend him all the time.
Dr. Stein is extremely knowledgeable and takes his time with each patient.

He is incredibly thorough, professional and polite.  He is also one of the best in his field.  The head of orthopedics asked who my primary care physician was and when I said it was Dr. Stein, he replied, „He‘s also my primary care physician.“   He is the very best.
Takes his time ask you all the right questions.

reviewDetails.comment:
First, my e- mails have so far never been answered by the dr., instead they are always answered electronically with a pre- manufactured text prompting me to make a Zoom  appointment . The Zoom meeting was over in 5 minutes and the Covid protocol recited to me by the doctor. When asked about Paxlovid I was told that it“ might“ be considered only if Over 65 ( which the doctor knows I am) and with fever and cough which I experienced before, but not on the day of the meeting. All that the meeting provided was just the protocol, no personalization.  I could have easily read this myself off an information sheet. I told the dr. that, although it is already 9 days into me having Covid, I am still feeling extremely fatigued and sick, I was told „that this is individual“. There was no personalized advice about the symptoms I  am experiencing. I felt  neither heard  nor seen. I felt like I had been  in a meeting  with a robot not a human being.
It was really wasted time and money.
Dr. Altman was super friendly and provided me with a course of action to addressing my health concern.
I had a virtual visit with Dr. Altman and her assessment, treatment and follow-up was excellent.
Dr. Altman is attentive and knowledgeable. She's a strong GP.

A wonderful doctor, patient, calm, always takes her time, excellent with online communication (questions, referrals, refills, anything). She knows when to tell you to ignore, or observe, or address an issue immediately - just good instincts and a great personality.
Dt. Altman was very attentive and responsive. I have been very happy with her care.

I had a bug bite that was very itchy and I thought was no big deal but when I sent her a picture she made time to see me right away. It turned out to be a tick bite and she gave me antibiotics, saving me potential Lyme disease! She is so friendly, prompt, available, and makes you a partner in your care, explaining options and offering great referrals.
